title: AI Research Lab
desc: Advanced research in machine learning, natural language processing, and computer vision.

title: Robotics & Automation Lab
desc: Equipped for building and testing autonomous systems, drones, and robotic arms.

title: Web Technologies Lab
desc: Experiment with the latest web frameworks, APIs, and serverless architectures.

title: Cybersecurity Operations Center
desc: A simulated environment for network defense, threat analysis, and ethical hacking exercises.

title: VR/AR Development Lab
desc: Create immersive virtual and augmented reality experiences with cutting-edge hardware.

title: Game Design & Development Studio
desc: A creative space with high-performance PCs and software for building video games.

title: High-Performance Computing Center
desc: Access powerful computing clusters for complex simulations and large-scale data analysis.

title: Digital Fabrication Lab (FabLab)
desc: Bring your ideas to life with 3D printers, laser cutters, and other fabrication tools.

title: Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) Lab
desc: Study and design the future of how people interact with technology.

title: Data Science & Analytics Lab
desc: Work with large datasets and advanced analytical tools to uncover insights and trends.
